name: Racing angle
description:
Developing my first game, I wanted to give the player a new gaming experience. In the game Racing angle[/ b], each level has a unique camera angle and you need to master the control of your car well, since you can’t control the gas and the brake. All red objects on the level when touched cause damage and the player needs to try to pass the level without touching.Features:[/ h2]
  • 15 levels
  • Unique camera angle in each level
  • Addictive racing gameplay
  • Operation with only two buttons
  • Gamepad support
  • Electronic music[/ list]
